video_prompt: **Prompt:** Anime-style cafe on a sunny beach. Birds gracefully fly across the sky. The cafe owner waves from the entrance. Waves gently lap the shore. Footprints appear and disappear on the sand. A pink flowering tree sways in the breeze.
image_prompt: **Anime illustration of a charming two-story cafe with "Rugon" sign on a sunny beach. Features a man waving at the entrance, lush trees (one pink flowering), white birds, fluffy clouds, distant mountains with a blue-roofed building, and turquoise ocean with footprints on the sand. Warm, inviting glow. 9:16 aspect ratio.**
refined_video_prompt: Birds gracefully traverse the sky. A cafe owner waves cheerfully from an entrance. Waves gently lap the shore, receding and advancing. Footprints materialize and vanish on the sand. A flowering tree sways rhythmically in the breeze.
